content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 29}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=40.0, y=-82.0))
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 39}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=45.0, y=-83.0))
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 40}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=42.0, y=-81.0))
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 40}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=45.0, y=-80.0))
-  Furnace(fuel=Inventory({'coal': 40}), name='stone-furnace', direction=Direction.UP, position=Position(x=40.0, y=-79.0))

### Lab
Consists of lab at position with lab_input={'automation-science-pack': 100} and status=EntityStatus.NO_POWER

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipe to boiler
-  Ensure that the pipe connection is not blocked by another entity before attempting to connect.
-  Make sure to check if the pipe connection already exists before attempting to connect.

### Errors when using burner mining drill
-  Ensure that the burner mining drill has sufficient fuel before attempting to mine.

### Errors when using offshore pump
-  Ensure that the offshore pump is working and has a valid fluid connection before attempting to use.

### Errors when using boiler
-  Ensure that the boiler has sufficient fuel before attempting to use.
-  Make sure to check the fluid box and fluid systems of the boiler before attempting to use.

### Errors when using steam engine
-  Ensure that the steam engine has a valid fluid connection and sufficient input liquid before attempting to use.
-  Make sure to check the connection points and fluid box of the steam engine before attempting to use.
